title: Appalachian Spirit Health & Wellness Fair
description: Appalachian Spirit Health & Wellness Fair Hosted By Nicole Skaggs. Event starts on Saturday, 14 October 2023 and happening at The Square at Fairfield Glade Resort, Rockwood, TN. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Time Sat Oct 14 2023 at 08:00 am to 03:00 pm (GMT-05:00) Google Calendar Outlook Calendar iCal Calendar Yahoo Calendar The Square at Fairfield Glade Resort, Rockwood, United States Advertisement About the eventAppalachian Spirit Health & Wellness Fair Immerse yourself in an environment filled with inspiring people and interactive demonstrations and talks. Engage with experts in various disciplines, including meditation, yoga, gut health, herbal medicine, nutrition, energy healing, and much more. Discover personalized solutions tailored to your unique needs. Indulge your senses with organic and locally-sourced products offering a treasure trove of natural remedies, herbal supplements, nourishing foods, eco-friendly products, and mindfully-crafted artisanal goods. You'll find everything you need to support your holistic lifestyle and enhance your overall well-being. The Appalachian Spirit Health & Wellness Fair is not just an event; it's also a celebration of the Appalachian Spirit and that particular view on naturopathic self-care, mindfulness, sustainability and true empowerment. Whether you're seeking relaxation, rejuvenation, or a deeper understanding of your body's innate wisdom to heal itself, this event promises to be a transformative experience on your journey.
